name: Inside The Alien
description:
Play as a cute bacteriophage invading a mysterious alien and finding some interesting inhabitants.

Controls:

  • left arrow, right arrow: movement
  • C : jump. Press for longer jump, tap for shorter jump.
  • X : shoot/dash. Press to start aiming. Use the arrow keys to aim while having X pressed. You can aim top-left by pressing left arrow and top arrow simultaneously. You can have more precise aiming by interpolating between a diagonal and cardinal direction. Release X to shoot. You will get to shoot again by touching the ground or hitting an enemy creature.
  • R : Restart the game.
  • = : Increase volume
  • - : Decrease volume.

Credits:

  • Sherjil "Atlatic" Ozair: gameplay design, programming, and miscellaneous art
  • Giovanni Maldonado: character design, animations,  and background art
  • creonico: tileset design
  • G. Smith: music and sound effects
  • Julien Palliere: music

Made in 48 hours for the Butterscotch Shenanijam 2019 using the theme "DNA Chaos".
